name: Fleur Cannon
effect:
Inflicts Wounds. Reduce User's Special by 2 
 At Silver Rank, increase this move's power to 7.
 At Gold Rank, the User may create Grassy Terrain for 3 Rounds.
 At Platinum Rank, increase this move's power to 10.
 At Diamond Rank, the User may use Special for this Move's Accuracy.
description: A light beam pierces the battlefield, it deals devastating damage but leaves newly grown flowers instead of scorched earth. The user is left feeling very tired.
